title: My game just got cancelled?
body:
I was in a middle of a game until my lol started to show attempting to reconnect. I then restarted my lol client to see if it would stop attempting to reconnect then i never got the option to reconnect back to the game, instead it just put back to the home area for lol. Did someone just ddos my game or was it a lol server problem?.

OP.GG is still showing me that im in a live game: http://prntscr.com/h0vfax

Such a shame because it was right after my double.

replies.body:
There was an issue with the match; however, the issue has since been resolved. Because the game itself didn’t finish, no one should’ve lost LP. 

I hope that helps.
Same literally just happened to me... Very unimpressed.. Did you lose any points?
Nah my lp is still the same
Hey folks! I'll ask around if there may have been any server issues recently and get back to y'all. Hang tight!
